mapper.delete: DELETE ss FROM shop_sku ss LEFT JOIN shop_spec_value ssv ON ss.id = ssv.sku_id LEFT JOIN shop_spec ss ON ss.id = ssv.spec_id WHERE ss.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT ss.* FROM shop_sku ss LEFT JOIN shop_spec_value ssv ON ss.id = ssv.sku_id LEFT JOIN shop_spec ss ON ss.id = ssv.spec_id WHERE ss.product_id = #{productId}
